last_episode_to_air.name: A Dangerous Woman Arrives
last_episode_to_air.overview: Turbo Granny reveals that Okarun's missing organs are contained within golden spheres. Aira, who has found one, now has the ability to see spirits.

name: Dan Da Dan
overview: In a bet to prove whether ghosts or aliens exist, two high schoolers face terrifying paranormal threats, gain superpowers and maybe even fall in love?!

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: When high schooler Momo, from a family of spirit mediums, first meets her classmate Okarun, an occult geek, they argue—Momo believes in ghosts but denies aliens, and Okarun believes in aliens but denies ghosts. When it turns out both phenomena are real, Momo awakens a hidden power and Okarun gains the power of a curse. Together, they must challenge the paranormal forces threatening their world.

episodes.name: That's How Love Starts, Ya Know!
episodes.overview: Momo believes in ghosts. Okarun believes in aliens. To make each other believe what they deny, they head to a spot famous for UFO sightings and a spiritual hotspot.

guest_stars.character: Serpoian A / Serpoian B / Serpoian C (voice)
guest_stars.name: Kazuya Nakai

episodes.name: That's a Space Alien, Ain't It?!
episodes.overview: Momo awakens psychic powers, while Okarun is cursed by Turbo Granny. They evacuate to Momo's house, but a giant alien appears before them.

episodes.name: It's a Granny vs. Granny Clash!
episodes.overview: After Momo's grandmother temporarily suppresses the evil spirit within Okarun, she says that a game of tag may be the key to defeating it for good.

episodes.name: Kicking Turbo Granny's Ass
episodes.overview: Okarun and Momo arrive at the tunnel to confront Turbo Granny. Just when they think they've won, a giant crab spirit crashes through the wall.

episodes.name: Like, Where Are Your Balls?!
episodes.overview: Momo and Okarun’s ordeal with Turbo Granny has brought them closer, but things remain awkward between them. Okarun realizes he still has a problem.

episodes.name: A Dangerous Woman Arrives
episodes.overview: Turbo Granny reveals that Okarun's missing organs are contained within golden spheres. Aira, who has found one, now has the ability to see spirits.
